item.title: Git Stash and Diff Patches
item.description: Saving Changes to Apply Later in Git Git provides lightweight ways to save uncommitted changes so they can be applied laterâ€”useful for repeated deployment tweaks, build configuration changes, or quick context switching without commits. Git Stash: Temporary Change Storage Git stash temporarily saves your working directory changes and restores a clean state. Basic Stash Operations List all saved stashes: git stash list Save current changes with an automatic message: git stash Save current changes with a custom description:
